author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...OCTAVE SLIGHTLY STRENGTHENS WHILE HEADING NORTHEASTWARD... As of 8:00 PM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 16.4, -122.8 with movement NE at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Octave (EP5/EP152025)
